code: import React from'react';import{Card,button}from'react-bootstrap';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'./Team.css';import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import{faArrowRight}from'@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Team=function Team(props){var _props$teams=props.teams,strTeam=_props$teams.strTeam,strCountry=_props$teams.strCountry,strTeamBadge=_props$teams.strTeamBadge,idTeam=_props$teams.idTeam;var styleTeam={border:'2px solid red',margin:'10px',borderRadius:'20px',display:'float-left'};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"team-style ",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:styleTeam,className:"col-md-6 my-6 team",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row-md-4 my-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{style:{width:'16rem'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Body,{className:"style",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{style:{width:'150px'},src:strTeamBadge,alt:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Title,{children:["Name:",strTeam]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Subtitle,{className:"mb-2 text-muted",children:["Country:",strCountry]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/Team/".concat(idTeam),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{variant:"primary",children:["Explore ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faArrowRight})," "]})})]})})})})});};export default Team;
